about.title: About me
about.subtitle: I am a Front end developer with an enthusiasm for technology.
about.description: Front-end developer and Systems Engineering student with great interest in technology and collaboration on open source projects. My expertise is in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React and TypeScript. My enthusiasm and dedication drive me to constantly learn and grow. I am always open to new opportunities.
